mapper.sql: WITH LST AS ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER () RNUM FROM (
mapper.select:
SELECT T1.MSGSEQ ,T1.TITLE ,T1.CONT_TYPE ,T1.CONT ,T1.SENDER_ID ,T3.USER_NM AS SENDER_NM ,T1.VOLATILE_YN ,T1.FORWARD_YN ,T1.REF_ID ,TO_CHAR(T1.REF_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REF_DT ,T1.REF_SENDER ,T2.USER_NM AS REF_SENDER_NM ,T2.DEPT_CD AS REF_SENDER_DEPT_CD ,T2.DEPT_NM AS REF_SENDER_DEPT_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.EXPIRE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRE_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT ,T1.SEND_STATUS ,T1.SENT_RESULT_CD ,T1.URGENT_YN ,T1.RECV_TYPE ,T1.RECV_NM ,T1.ATTACH_YN ,T1.RESERV_SEQ FROM TB_SPUSH_MSG T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T2 ON T1.REF_SENDER = T2.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T3 ON T1.SENDER_ID = T3.USER_ID
AND T1.SENDER_ID = #{SENDER_ID}
AND T3.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{SENDER_NM} || '%'
AND T1.RECV_NM LIKE '%' || #{RECV_NM} || '%'
AND T1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
AND T1.CONT LIKE '%' || #{CONT} || '%'
AND T1.SEND_STATUS = #{SEND_STATUS}
AND T1.REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{START_TIME}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{END_TIME}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY T1.MSGSEQ DESC

SELECT T1.MSGSEQ ,T1.TITLE ,T1.CONT_TYPE ,T1.CONT ,T1.SENDER_ID ,T3.USER_NM AS SENDER_NM ,T1.VOLATILE_YN ,T1.FORWARD_YN ,T1.REF_ID ,TO_CHAR(T1.REF_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REF_DT ,T1.REF_SENDER ,T2.USER_NM AS REF_SENDER_NM ,T2.DEPT_CD AS REF_SENDER_DEPT_CD ,T2.DEPT_NM AS REF_SENDER_DEPT_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.EXPIRE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRE_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT ,T1.SEND_STATUS ,T1.SENT_RESULT_CD ,T1.SENT_RESULT_MSG ,T1.URGENT_YN ,T1.RECV_TYPE ,T1.RECV_NM ,T1.ATTACH_YN ,T1.RESERV_SEQ ,T1.DEL_YN ,T1.FWD_ALLOW_YN FROM TB_SPUSH_MSG T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T2 ON T1.REF_SENDER = T2.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T3 ON T1.SENDER_ID = T3.USER_ID WHERE T1.MSGSEQ = #{MSGSEQ}

SELECT FILE_ID ,MSGSEQ ,RESERV_SEQ ,FILE_NM ,FILE_EXT ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_TYPE ,THUMB_PATH ,TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM TB_SPUSH_MSG_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{FILE_ID}
